item.description:
Thursday Night Drop-In Class location, time and curriculum updated!

Drop-In Mixed Bag Class will be held outdoors at 182 Hayden Rowe Street in Hopkinton, MA at 7:00p with Higher Expectations Dog Training & Behavior Modification!  (http://www.facebook.com/hedogtraining ... http://www.higherexpectations.net ... http://www.hexdogs.weebly.com ... http://www.meetup.com/hedogtraining)

This updated curriculum will focus heavily on proofing known cues with increasing distractions for control of your dog in every situation.  We will work everything from your basics (sit, down, stay, come, heel) to commands at a distance, tricks, agility elements, proper greetings, Canine Good Citizen steps and more!  Requests taken every week.

No prerequisite. Any age, breed, level welcome.  Email justcassie101@gmail.com with any specific questions.  No commitment or advanced noticed required.

Cost is $15 (cash) per dog per "drop-in!"

Equipment:

> 4-6 foot fixed lead (NO flexi/extendable leashes, please.)

> Plenty of soft, smelly, bite-sized treats that your dog LOVES

> A confident attitude! :)

No classes on holidays or "eves" of holidays!
item.name: Drop-In Mixed Bag Class every Thursday at 7:00p in Hopkinton!
